title: 1985 Mercedes Benz 500 SEL
item_description:
1985 Mercedes Benz 500 SEL

Specifications

  • Year: 1985
  • Make: Mercedes Benz
  • VIN: WDBCA37D2FA097076
  • License: 1LNR346
    • Registration Expiration: 10/18/2003
    • Planned Non-Op Registration
  • Odometer Reads: 169,486
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 4895
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: V8
  • Body Style: Sedan
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 215/70r14

Exterior

  • Doors: Four Door 

Interior

  • Interior Material: Vinyl
  • Interior Color: Red
  • Features:
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows

Note: This vehicle is behind sold on behalf of an Estate.  Application for Replacement Title or Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 3-4 weeks after removal. The Seller sells this vehicle "as-is" in unknown running condition in planned non-operational registration with no smog performed by the Seller. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, repairs to smog if needed, transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to California DMV.
